SELECT q.* FROM biz_question q
LEFT JOIN biz_question_type t ON t.type_id = q.type_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_question (type_id, content, options, answer, analysis, difficulty, subject, knowledge_points, file_id, creator_id) VALUES (#{typeId}, #{content}, #{options}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{difficulty}, #{subject}, #{knowledgePoints}, #{fileId}, #{creatorId})
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_question SET type_id = #{typeId}, content = #{content}, options = #{options}, answer = #{answer}, analysis = #{analysis}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, subject = #{subject}, knowledge_points = #{knowledgePoints}, file_id = #{fileId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
